metadata.title: CVE-2020-15954 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: KDE KMail 19.12.3 (aka 5.13.3) engages in unencrypted POP3 communicationduring times when the UI indicates that encryption is in use.

criterions.comment: kdepim-runtime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
kmail-account-wizard: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
